channel.title: Mest on Mindbliss Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Mest on Mindbliss Blog

item.title: Hi Mindbliss6
item.description: Monthly Recurring Revenue is one of the most important metrics you need for measuring health of your subscription business. Recently I have done comprehensive research to find out how to calculate MRR. Although I have found so many good definitions but I haven’t found any practical one. In this post I will explain how to calculate MRR by using one of my favourite python libraries (Pandas).
